ban.deleteLessThan: delete days cannot be less than zero.
ban.deleteMoreThan: delete days cannot be more than 7.
ban.timeLessThan: time cannot be less than one (1).
ban.alreadyBannedDesc: It looks like **{0}** is already banned here..
ban.noBanSelf: pretty sure you don't want to do this to yourself.
ban.noBanOwner: you cannot ban the server owner.
ban.noBanOther: you cannot ban **{0}** as their highest role is higher than yours!
ban.meNoBan: I cannot ban **{0}**, as their highest role is higher than, or as high as mine.
ban.englishOnly: The provided reason must be comprised of English characters only.

kick.noSelf: Pretty sure you don't want to do this to yourself.
kick.noKick: you cannot kick **{0}** as their highest role is higher than yours!
kick.meNoKick: I cannot kick **{0}**, as their highest role is higher than, or as high as mine.
kick.englishOnly: The provided reason must be comprised of English characters only.
kick.noKickOwner: you cannot kick the server owner.

lock.description: Lock a channel to prevent people talking in it.
lock.alreadyDeniedThis: the send messages permission seems to already be denied in this channel
lock.alreadyDeniedThat: the send messages permission seems to already be denied on that channel
lock.executed:
lock executed.
Note: This lock will not work if a user has the `administrator` permission, or if `send messages` is ticked to yes in the channels permission overrides.

lockdown.description: Lock all channels in the server.
lockdown.alreadyDone: The server seems to be locked down already. If you believe this is an error, please ask for help in our support server. (`support` command)

help.noInclude: Do not include the `<>` when running commands.
help.main: This command consists of several subcommands.

set.missingPermission: I cannot set to <#{0}> because I am missing the permission **{1}** in that channel. Either update the permissions, or chose a different channel.
set.title: Moderation Log Set
set.desc: Moderation actions will now be logged to this channel.

disable.notEnabled: The modlog is not enabled currently.
disable.remove:
Would you like to delete the webhook that was used?
Answer **Yes** or **No**
disable.$: ^ do NOT translate the yes / no, these are the accepted values
disable.title: Moderation Logging Disabled
disable.desc: The modlog has been disabled by **{0}**.

list.noEntries: That user doesn't have any modlog entries to list.
list.invalidPage: Invalid page **{0}**, provide a number between **1** and **{1}**.
list.title: Modlog For {0}
list.name: Case #{0}
list.note: Note: due the the way old systems worked, this may not reflect all entries.
list.devOnlyFlag: The flag you provided is only accessible to developers.

mute.tooLittleTime: time cannot be less than one (1).
mute.noMuteOther: you cannot mute **{0}** as their highest role is higher than yours!
mute.noRoleDesc: this server does not have a mute role set, you can set this with `{0}settings mute role <role>`
mute.roleNotFoundDesc: The mute role specified for this server <@&{0}> ({1}) was not found, it has been reset. You can set a new one with `{2}settings mute role <role>`
mute.invalidRoleDesc: The current mute role <@&{0}> ({1}) seems to be higher than me, please move it below me. You can set a new one with `{2}settings mute role <role>`
mute.alreadyMutedDesc: The user **{0}** seems to already be muted.. You can unmute them with `{1}unmute {0} [reason]`
mute.englishOnly: The provided reason must be comprised of English characters only.

prune.amount: please provide a valid number between two (2) and 1000.
prune.skipped:
Skipped {0} message(s), reason: they are over 2 weeks old.
Note: this is a technical limitation from Discord, not us.

reason.description: Change the reason for a modlog entry
reason.noModlog: I couldn't find the mod log for this server, so previous entries cannot be edited.
reason.noMessage: the specified entry ({0}) does not have a message id associated with it, so it cannot be edited.
reason.messageNotFound: the message for that entry could not be found. If the mod log channel has changed, the entry cannot be edited.
reason.badlyFormed: the embed for the mod log entry seems to be badly formed, it cannot be edited.
reason.englishOnly: The provided reason must be comprised of English characters only.
reason.tooLong: that reason is too long, it must be at most 200 characters.
reason.edited: the reason for case **#{0}** has been updated to "{1}".

setup-mutes.noRole: No mute role has been setup. You can set one up by using `{0}settings mute role @Role`
setup-mutes.confirm: This will update **{0}** channels, and this action is not reversible, are you sure? **yes** or **no**.
setup-mutes.canceled: Canceled due to timeout, invalid response, or general cancellation.
setup-mutes._: Do not translate "yes" or "no", they are literal values.

softban.description: Ban someone, then immediately unban them to remove their messages.
softban.deleteLessThan: delete days cannot be less than zero.
softban.deleteMoreThan: delete days cannot be more than 14.
softban.timeLessThan: time cannot be less than one (1).
softban.alreadyBannedDesc: It looks like **{0}** is already banned here..
softban.noSoftBanSelf: pretty sure you don't want to do this to yourself.
softban.noSoftBanOwner: you cannot ban the server owner.
softban.noSoftBanOther: you cannot ban **{0}** as their highest role is higher than yours!
softban.meNoSoftBan: I cannot soft ban **{0}**, as their highest role is higher than, or as high as mine.
softban.englishOnly: The provided reason must be comprised of English characters only.

unban.description: Remove bans for people that have already been banned.
unban.notBannedDesc: It doesn't look like {0} is banned here..
unban.englishOnly: The provided reason must be comprised of English characters only.

unlock.description: Unlock a channel after it has been locked.
unlock.thisNotLocked: this channel doesn't seem to be locked.
unlock.thatNotLocked: that channel doesn't seem to be locked.

unlockdown.description: Unlock all channels in the server.
unlockdown.notDone: The server does not seem to be locked down. If you believe this is an error, please ask for help in our support server. (`support` command)

unmute.noRoleDesc: this server does not have a mute role set, you can set this with `{0}settings mute role <role>`
unmute.roleNotFoundDesc: The mute role specified for this server <@&{0}> ({1}) was not found, it has been reset. You can set a new one with `{2}settings mute role <role>`
unmute.invalidRoleDesc: The current mute role <@&{0}> ({1}) seems to be higher than me, please move it below me. You can set a new one with `{2}settings mute role <role>`
unmute.notMutedDesc: The user **{0}** seems to not be muted.. You can mute them with `${1}mute {0} [reason]`
unmute.englishOnly: The provided reason must be comprised of English characters only.
